title: Advanced Queries
description: Build a social media analytics system using GORM that demonstrates advanced querying techniques, aggregations, and complex data analysis.
short_description: Learn GORM advanced queries and build a social media analytics system
learning_objectives: Implement complex database queries with GORM
Use aggregations and group by operations
Work with subqueries and raw SQL
Implement pagination and efficient data retrieval
real_world_connection: Social media platforms and analytics systems require complex queries to generate insights, user recommendations, and engagement statistics.
requirements: Implement top users by post count aggregation
Create paginated post retrieval with user info
Filter popular posts by time period and likes
